name: Eggscape (Ainezumi)
description:
Humphrey frantically runs away from the dangerous forest and heads to the rugged castle. Before it's too late, help him jump over the obstacles on the road! 

• Eggscape's Link = https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/671334062

- - - How to Play - - -

➤ Press the "space bar" to jump over obstacles.

- - - Scoring System - - - 

— If Humphrey dodges a:

★ Crow/Kite = +75 points

★ Rock/Rosebush/Wall = +50 points

— If Humphrey hits into an:

★ Obstacle (Crow/Kite/Rock/Rosebush/Wall) = -25 points & -1 life
